original_text: A slothful man hideth his hand in his bosom, and will not so much as bring it to his mouth again.
korean_text: 게으른 자는 자기의 손을 그릇에 넣고서도 입으로 올리기를 괴로워하느니라

sentences.original_text: A slothful man hideth his hand in his bosom
sentences.korean_translation: 게으른 사람은 자기 손을 품에 숨기고

sentences.original_text: and will not so much as bring it to his mouth again
